Very fun game to play on your own, but it gets ten times better with friends since there are many elements to the game that work better with communication. While somethings can be seen as unfair to go against, there is almost always a counter in the game that isn't that hard to get the hang of.

Ignore the negativity from others. This is a fantastic game for anyone interested in the horror genre. Tons of fun to play alone or with friends. Game offers hours of entertainment with the option of fantastic killers both original and licensed franchises

This game is amazing fun. I have a few hundred hours (over the course of two years) in it and it just keeps changing and for the most part, getting better. The devs love this game and pour themselves into it and it shows, if you compare to most AAA games out there. They work hard, listen to their player base (not as much as most hope and changes are at times slow to come, but it still shows very clearly). 

I will probably put in another few hundred hours in the coming year or so. I strongly recommend this game. Especially if you want something fun to do with a couple friends.
Honestly a fucking sick game when im with my mate who plays this its great we have fun on survivor and when im on my own i just play killer. Played a ton more on PS4 but still enjoying on pc.

It can be tough first starting out, no perks or items to assist in surviving or killing. Honestly that is when the game is most fun in my opinion, very basic and requires the most skill from both killers and survivors. Overall a good game, has minor bugs to be expected with an online game(lags, timeouts, servers dropping), some killers and perks feel overpowered, and more often than not those that main killers say the same of survivors and their perks. But it can be pretty balanced. It just means changing strategies based on the killer or guessing what perks people are using to combat it.
Take me away to that toxic place

This game is definetly worth grabbing for the price. Playing solo or with friends is always a blast. Has plenty of different killers and perks to enjoy. The toxic killers and survivors are annoying but, besides those players, the game is very enjoyable for hours.
I personally really enjoy this game. There are definitely balancing issues on both sides, but usually most of my matches are fun experiences.

Pro's - This is a game that you must play with friends if you choose to play "Survs" .. it is a must for you sanity ,  But if you choose "Killer" than this is the single player game for you. 
Cons - Devs .. must improve on simple things such as "Hitbox_Size" & improve on the Anticheat Mechanics.
cool game with alot of potential
This game is epic. It's awesome with friends but also awesome even if it's just you. It's scary at the beginning but you get used to it. It's just stays very intense. Definetly worth the money!
Thoroughly enjoyed it, for the hours i put in, found it quite repetitive there after... still a good game for the price :)
Listen, this game is niche. I know that. But if you are debating getting it, try it now, because it is definitely worth the buy. I almost haven't stopped playing it.
